name: OTech Jet
description: OTech Jet is a silver particle-free conductive ink optimized for inkjet printing. It enables the printing of highly conductive, smooth, and uniform layers and patterns. OrelTech’s unique process allows the deposition of highly conductive thin metallic films. The thin layers undergo short development using cold plasma treatment resulting in a fine metal structure. OrelTech’s technology enables the deposition of the ink with many different methods and on various substrates, from plastics to fabrics. OTech inks do not contain nanoparticles, and as such enable the material economy of precious metals while being significantly more environmentally friendly than the existing alternatives on the market.
